name: Worst Tank - 3D Edition
description:
Hey,

This game is a fun spin off of our existing game worst tanks. We thought it would be cool to make a small 3D edition as our way of saying thanks for the support. This edition of worst tanks is close to being the same as the original edition with 3 extra tough 3D levels. As per the future of this edition it may receive few updates for levels or bug fixes however most likely this edition of the game will not be a replacement for the original edition. We hope you enjoy the game. Thanks :)

Original Game Link:  https://pacchu.itch.io/worsttank

Controls:

AD or arrow keys for rotation

Left Mouse Button for shoot

Escape for pause

R for restart level

Worst Tank - 3D Edition By Pacchu and Paz
